hackathon-description-text: The Office and SharePoint Add-ins model is a powerful extensibility model that you can leverage as a web developer. You can visit the Office Store (
hackathon-eligibility: You must be attending the conference.
hackathon-requirements:
You will need:
You can test your Office add-ins:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: An Xbox ONE per member of the winning team with a max team of 4.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: The solution has made good use of Office 365 APIs.
The solution has an Office Add-in and leverages the Office.JS API to increase users productivity.
The solution has an SharePoint Add-in and leverages the Office 365 APIs or SharePoint CSOM/REST APIs to increase the users productivity.
The Solution does something that is unique and innovative.

hackathon-description-header: Build amazing add-ins for Office and SharePoint in Office 365
